pages.text: $(li)The Siphon enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/shulker_box)Shulker Box$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you pick an item that the Shulker Box has at least one of the same type, it will be placed inside instead of your main inventory.
pages.title: Siphon

pages.text: $(li)This enchantment can be found Fishing or trading with the $(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarians$(/l).
